message.body: Cindy is coming by tomorrow around 3. Is there anyway you could be home around then? If not what time works for you? I'd really like if you were there when she comes.
No I'm at gallery 12-6
Why should I be there? I've been there most times..
She sprays and dusts and I explain that I'm still nightly putting my bedding through dryer and bed is away from all things etc and she says ok
OK. You don't have to be there. It's just you / your room have had more bugs & more bites then anyone else.
It could be the bedbugs have become resistant to the chemical. But I think Cindy is missing something somewhere.
Yes you need a new person IMO
I've been there most times
I don't mind being there again
I just am not sure how her coming and doing same thing is going to make any difference
But who knows
I don't think it's her fault
I did a lot of research and bed bugs are resistant to basically everything
Yeah. I'm talked to Beth for awhile in the last few days. I want her to come out & treat like every couple days until they are gone.
You basically need to tend the house
Tent
Which I'm sure is out of everyone's price range so not sure what that means
Unfortunately Alex took at longer then I had hoped to get ready & then to call at back.
All the dust and chemicals only kills like 50percent of them even in controlled Petri dishes
I'm not sure. It could be but people do get rid of bedbugs without tenting houses. I'm pretty sure Beth's success rate was 100%.
If I have to tent, I'll tent. I HAVE to get rid of them.
I think tenting is like...a billion dollars haha
Anyways good luck

So between you & me. My plan is to have Cindy come & treat every couple days for another week. Like 3 or 4 more treatments. If that doesn't do it then we bring in another company. Kevin has someone else who can do it.
That's a good idea
I'll keep my door open for her tomorrow
It's weird though that this started in David & Phillips room & then spread to your room & then Kevin's & last to Alex's room.
Neither David or Phillip have noticed bugs or bites in weeks. Kevin hasn't gotten anything in a couple weeks & Alex has been about a week without anything.
So I think they are hiding somewhere in your room & Cindy is just missing it somehow.
But again
But again if Cindy can't get the job done & if Beth won't be back for weeks then we need to try something else.
I left door open for Cindy :) I wish her luck!
